Text: What a fantastic upload! I remember I compiled all these from various sources a while back, but you sir, are a terrific uploader!
Wow, this torrent even has the 4 page comic that came with the (Best Buy only) version of Babylon 5 - The Lost Tales. I've been looking everywhere for that. Thanks again!
Last year I started watching the TV series and now I am into season three. Thanks for making these issues available!
